data.text: Hiob toaa nʼasɛm so sɛ,
“Sɛ Onyankopɔn te ase yi, ɔno a wammu me atɛntenenee,
mmerɛ dodoɔ a nkwa wɔ me mu,
mʼano renka amumuyɛsɛm,
Merennye nto mu da sɛ deɛ woka no yɛ nokorɛ;
Mɛkura me tenenee mu. Merennyaa mu;
“Ma mʼatamfoɔ nyɛ sɛ amumuyɛfoɔ,
Anidasoɔ bɛn na deɛ ɔnni nyamesu no wɔ wɔ ne wuo akyi,
Onyankopɔn tie ne sufrɛ
Nʼani bɛgye wɔ Otumfoɔ mu?
“Mɛma mo Onyankopɔn tumi ho nkyerɛkyerɛ;
Mo ankasa moahunu yeinom nyinaa.
“Yei ne deɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ ama omumuyɛfoɔ,
Sɛ ɔwɔ mma dodoɔ sɛn ara, wɔn hyɛberɛ ne akofena;
Ɔyaredɔm bɛsie wɔn a wɔbɛka wɔ nʼakyi,
Ɛwom sɛ ɔhɔre dwetɛ te sɛ mfuturo
nanso deɛ ɔpɛ gu hɔ no, ateneneefoɔ na wɔbɛfira
Efie a ɔsi no te sɛ ananse afafa,
Ɔda hɔ te sɛ ɔdefoɔ, nanso ɔrenna saa bio;
Ahunahuna ba ne so sɛ nsuyire;
Apueeɛ mframa soa no kɔ, na ɔnni hɔ bio;
Ɛbɔ no a ahummɔborɔ nni mu
Ɔde fɛ bɔ ne nsam
